oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Cpl. Henry Marshall Misemer, Co. F, 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA, to wife Martha
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cpl. Henry Marshall Misemer, Co. F, 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA, describes in his letter to his wife Martha that he wants to be appointed deputy sheriff of Monroe County, Tennessee, so that he can be discharged from the army. He asks her to burn this letter. For the entire collection of letters, see TSLA Mf. #2008, the Henry Marshall Misemer Civil War Letters.
